Review Text: I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before.

reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Great stocking stuffer!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Strong inclination towards gel nail products with multiple color options, along with a growing interest in skincare products like masks. 
- **Quality Focus:** Values high-quality, long-lasting items in both nail and skincare products, prioritizing non-toxic and cruelty-free options.
- **Purchase Behavior:** Engages in thoughtful purchasing, demonstrating a desire for thorough product understanding before buying. Proactively acquires additional items to enhance performance and explores new options for gifts and skincare for family members.
- **Color Aesthetic:** Enjoys vibrant and varied color palettes, with a specific fondness for holiday-themed shades in nail products.
- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Shows enthusiasm for home nail care and DIY manicure kits, alongside an emerging interest in at-home skincare routines, signaling a hands-on approach to beauty.
- **Packaging Preference:** Appreciates practical features, such as color swatch stickers for organization in nail products and effective packaging in skincare.
- **Review Engagement:** Willing to leave detailed feedback based on hands-on experiences, reflecting a desire to share knowledge and assist others in their purchasing decisions, including feedback on products intended for family use.

Overall, the user exhibits a balanced approach, prioritizing quality and practicality in beauty and skincare while maintaining a vibrant and colorful aesthetic.
